Home

I'm a full stack web developer who specializes in (and loves) Node.js. I also enjoy occasionally experimenting with other programming languages, such as Haskell, C++, Scala, Clojure (if Leiningen wasn't so slow), and many of the languages that compile to JavaScript (my favorite is LiveScript). I also maintain a blog, full of various ramblings on coding, religion, politics, and whatever else crosses my mind that's vaguely worth rambling in a blog post for.

My passions aren't limited to merely programming. I also enjoy playing piano (sorry, no recordings), listening to music, and even creating it myself. My own music spans quite a few genres, but even the music I listen to is a bit broad. Oh, and I like reading anything intellectually interesting like IFLScience or BuzzFeed (and occasionally, less intellectually satisfying ones, too).
